name: Coloramba!
description:
Coloramba! is an elegant addictive-puzzle based on ultra hooking game Numberama which is being played by hundreds of thousands people all over the world! To be brief Coloramba! is a Numberama for those who’s better with colors rather than maths. And for those who’s craving for something new.

Aim of the game is to clean up a screen by excluding the same-colored figures (verticali or continiously).

Features:
• Classic game – 5 colors in a certain order
• Random colors game is for advanced players
• Medals. Collect all 22 medals as a reward for a good skills
• Up to 20 undo steps, don't worry about mistakes
• Undo by finger swiping
• Score, time, lines, pairs and left pairs statistics
• Different high scores for Classics and Random games
• Saving results to Camera Roll
• Demo mode for training
• iPad, iPad Retina, iPhone, iPhone Retina, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus Support
• Game Center Support
